summary: Simon, re: user jokingly asking if there's enough content for 478 episodes of a Lets Play
mainText: 'We will keep updating the games for many years to come!'

summary: Buddha, re: Rea's gift to Simon
Simon, re: user asking if there's enough content in Hytale to make content
mainText: 'Yes! There is plenty to do! There is also the creative mode, it will give a ton of good video ideas :)'

summary: Thomas, re: Hawkon also doing Sauna
Slikey, re: user asking his split
mainText: 'Push + Sauna, Pull, Legs and Rest then repeat'

summary: Thomas, re: user asking if people want AI upscaling natively and in real-time on future GPUs
mainText: 'Nope, I wouldn't want this soulless, uninspired, vomited HD version made by an algorithm. I want video games made by human authors who show intention, emotions,  and speak the same language than other humans. This is just a crappy gadget and I hope soon no one will care.'

summary: Thomas, re: Lynn saying the labeled 'middle' point isn't in the middle
mainText: 'This is a terrible graphic design mistake I fully take responsibility for üòî'

summary: Slikey, re: user saying Slikey's muscles get bigger as Hytale approaches
mainText: 'My last picture was deep into a cut - this one is basically mid of winter bulk. I am just pretty fat at the moment and gain some extra size that way lmao'

summary: Thomas, re: user noting Hytale's art style isn't in the direct middle of Pixel Art vs Hand Painted
mainText: 'This person is correct :D we are not exactly at the middle. All this is very subjective tho.'
